name: Grand Tour
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Bailout. Destination: Enter 2 flyby Spaces beyond Ceres zone in the same Turn.
imageDescription: Composite image showing Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune representing the grand tour mission visiting all giant planets using gravity slingshots.

name: Inner Tour
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Free Aqua when entering Aerobrake Hazards leading to LEO. Destination: Enter 4 different flyby Spaces in the same Turn.
imageDescription: Composite image showing Mercury, Venus, Earth, and Mars representing the inner solar system tour through flybys.

name: Extreme Sports
ability: Fulfilled Ability: +1 VP per glory chit. When Fulfilling: Flip one of your glory chits on your playmat face-up. Destination: With Human, enter Hazard, make a Hazard Roll, and land at your Factory in the same Turn.
imageDescription: Astronauts spacewalking near the ISS with Earth's horizon in background, representing extreme sports opportunities in space.

name: Vanity Project
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Connections. Destination: Enter Solar Oberth & Return.
imageDescription: Dramatic view of the Sun's corona and surface showing intense solar activity, representing the ultimate selfie opportunity.

name: Refugees
ability: When Fulfilling: Isobanker suffers immediate budget cuts. Destination: Isobank.
imageDescription: Astronauts working on Mars surface near a communication tower, representing refugees being resettled in space colonies.

name: Fugitive
ability: When Fulfilling: Owner of destination Colony suffers immediate budget cuts. Destination: Any player's BEO Colony.
imageDescription: Wanted poster style image with an astronaut helmet, representing fugitives escaping to space colonies.

name: Cen Tour
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Bailout. When Fulfilling: Gain 4 Aquas. Destination: Okyrhoe & Return.
imageDescription: Rocky asteroid Okyrhoe in space, a centaur that changed magnitude during its recent perihelion.

name: Chiron Quest
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Bailout. When Fulfilling: Gain 8 Aquas. Destination: Chiron.
imageDescription: Thermal imaging views of Chiron showing heat signatures, a near-dwarf planet with its own ring system between the gas giants.

name: Fulgurite Hunt
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Bailout. Destination: Triton, Io, or Ganymede Site (Neptune/Jupiter zones), & Return.
imageDescription: Fulgurite rock formation created by lightning strikes fusing ground material, valuable as art and for science.

name: Hubris
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Bailout. Destination: Site in a zone with an unclaimed glory chit.
imageDescription: Astronaut statue on Mars surface holding a helmet, representing elite ambitions for eternal glory in space.

name: Pleasure Garden
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Connections. Destination: Any Submarine Site beyond Ceres zone.
imageDescription: Interior view of a space station greenhouse with lush plants and fish in microgravity humid environment.

name: Comet Adventure
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Connections. Destination: Unexplored Synodic Site.
imageDescription: Comet streaking through space with bright tail against starfield, representing adventure tourism to highly inclined worlds.

name: Goo Spores
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Your augmented Colonist at a Submarine Site.
imageDescription: Electron microscope view of spherical self-replicating machine spores that could spread from subsurface oceans.

name: Robotic Facility
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Unexplored Synodic Site.
imageDescription: Robotic mining equipment and arm on lunar surface, representing automated workforce as alternative to expensive human labor.

name: HAVOC
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Free Aqua in Venus zone. Destination: Venus Site & Return.
imageDescription: Global view of Venus showing topographic data, representing the High Altitude Venus Operational Concept mission.

name: Artemis
ability: Fulfilled Ability: You may prospect Luna without permission from the 1st player. Destination: Unexplored Lunar Site & Return.
imageDescription: Orion spacecraft capsule being prepared for the Artemis program to return humans to Luna.

name: Home on Lagrange
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Connections. Destination: Your Anchored Bernal not in Venus/Earth/Mars zones.
imageDescription: Diagram showing Earth, Sun, and Lagrange points with spacecraft, representing optimal locations for space habitats.

name: New Horizons
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Adjacent to industrialized Sites (1/Spacecraft/Turn). Destination: Unexplored Size 2+ Site & Return.
imageDescription: New Horizons probe approaching Pluto, extending the catalogue of surveyed planets to manned landings.

name: ET Holy Grail
ability: When Fulfilling: If Bee-Zed is unexplored, place a Claim there. Destination: Bee-Zed (Season Red).
imageDescription: Artistic rendering of Bee-Zed near Jupiter with spacecraft, representing a potential interstellar wandering artifact.

name: Mars Polar Walk
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Connections. Destination: Mars North Pole & Return.
imageDescription: Mars surface showing layered terrain at the polar region, representing the first spacewalk on another planet.

name: Highest Cliff
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Connections. When Fulfilling: Gain 20 Aquas. Destination: Miranda.
imageDescription: Miranda's spectacular cliffs reaching over 20km in height, ideal for base jumping in low gravity.

name: Closest Planet
ability: Fulfilled Ability: -1 ISRU when prospecting Mercury. Destination: Unexplored Mercury Site.
imageDescription: Colorful global view of Mercury, the closest planet on average to Earth and every other planet.

name: Rivalry
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Gain 1 additional Aqua when fundraising. Destination: Site in farthest zone with a claimed glory chit & Return.
imageDescription: Famous Apollo bootprint on lunar surface, representing the space race and competition between space powers.

name: Fool's Gold
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Bailout. Destination: Site Adjacent to Hazard Space & Return.
imageDescription: Dark spherical body with explosive iceflash surface in space, representing dangerous but potentially valuable sites.

name: Topographic Ocean
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Gain 4 Aquas when any Colony is built on a Submarine Site. Destination: Unexplored Submarine Site beyond Ceres Zone & Return.
imageDescription: Cross-section view of subsurface ocean with hydrothermal vents and exotic Ice VII on ocean moons.

name: Mercury Forge
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Shielded. Destination: Mercury Site.
imageDescription: Mercury transiting in front of the Sun's corona, representing materials processing requiring thermal and radiation solutions.

name: Triggered Decay Positrons
ability: Fulfilled Ability: +1 flyby bonus from Radiation Belt (twice/Spacecraft/Turn). Destination: Saturn aerostat.
imageDescription: Saturn's radiation belt visualization showing triggered decay, the holy grail of battery design using exotic particles.

name: Plasma Intrusion Laboratory
ability: Fulfilled Ability: +1 flyby bonus from Radiation Belt (once/Spacecraft/Turn). Destination: Hyperion.
imageDescription: Jupiter with colorful magnetic field lines, showing where solar wind collisions create hot electrons and exotic physics.

name: Amalthea Halbonaut
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Shielded. Destination: Unexplored Size 7+ Site not in Earth zone.
imageDescription: Amalthea moon in Jupiter's shadow, the most challenging moon to explore due to ultrahigh radiation and electric currents.

name: Hexapod Explorer
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Insight. Destination: Unexplored Size 2+ Site.
imageDescription: Six-legged robotic rover with large tanks, representing bio-inspired robotic exploration algorithms.

name: Fullerene Cable Spinner
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Insight. Destination: Unexplored Synodic D Site, then Vesta.
imageDescription: Space elevator cable structure against starfield, representing carbon extraction for carbonaceous material production.

name: Equatorial Launch Railway
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Acetylene rocketplane liftoff is possible from all your Factories. It is half cost (round up) if the Site is Atmospheric. Destination: Unexplored Size 6+ Site, then liftoff from that Site.
imageDescription: Magnetic levitation launch railway on planetary surface, using returnable vehicles to counter gravity.

name: Golden Apples of the Sun
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Shielded. Destination: Kreutz Sungrazer (Season Yellow).
imageDescription: Close-up of the Sun's turbulent surface with bright flares, representing a lab to unlock Sol's secrets.

name: Solar Observatory
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Shielded. Destination: Icarus (Season Red).
imageDescription: Solar corona with magnetic loops and prominences, observing solar poles requires inclined orbit from Mercury-crosser Icarus.

name: Cyborg Transhumans
ability: When Fulfilling: Decommission a Colocated augmented Colonist. Destination: Isobank with an augmented Colonist.
imageDescription: Robonaut with gold visor in spacecraft, representing human-machine hybrids making decisions before Earth is aware.

name: Largest Object
ability: Fulfilled Ability: 'outburst', 'ice'. Destination: Comet Holmes (Season Red).
imageDescription: Comet Holmes glowing red after an unexplained mass ejection that briefly made it larger than the sun.

name: Goldilocks Luna Terraform
ability: Fulfilled Ability: You do not need permission to Prospect or use Factories on Luna. When Fulfilling: Discard Factories & Colonies on Luna; owners receive 8 Aquas/token removed. Destination: Icarus (Season Red).
imageDescription: Moon and atmospheric glow representing terraforming using outer dropstone moons to create a lunar rock-steam atmosphere.

name: Submersible Prospector
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Insight. Destination: Unexplored Submarine Site.
imageDescription: Spherical submersible with holes in subsurface ocean, exploring sites that may harbor exotic chemistries or life.

name: Ring Industrialization
ability: Fulfilled Ability: 'ring'; your Mobile Factories on 'ring' Hazards are C Factories. Destination: Using your freighter, enter Saturn flyby, & stop on crash Hazard on the same Turn.
imageDescription: Spacecraft near Saturn's rings with mechanical arms, mining facility using drones to collect ice and dust.

name: Beehive
ability: When Fulfilling: Remove Busted disk; prospect here at ISRU 0 w/reroll. Destination: Operational robonaut & refinery at Busted Size 1 Site.
imageDescription: Interior view of O'Neill cylinder habitat with forests and buildings, hollow worlds spun to create artificial gravity.

name: Daedalus Starship Research
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Insight. When Fulfilling: Decommission Colocated GW/TW thruster, supports; gain 12 Aquas. Destination: Operational GW/TW thruster at Comet Neujmin I (Season Blue).
imageDescription: Technical blueprint of Daedalus starship design, focusing on isotope collection for interstellar missions.

name: Sun-fired Laser
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Negotiable. Destination: Mercury L1 to Mercury L3 in 1 Turn.
imageDescription: The Sun's fiery surface representing a power-beaming swarm of sun-fired lasers in inclined orbits.

name: Ice Phase Research
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Insight. Destination: Unexplored Ganymede, Quaoar, or Comet Holmes Site.
imageDescription: Ganymede's cratered icy surface, studying structural changes of water ice over thermal history.

name: Green Magnetosphere
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Shielded. Destination: Mars Site, then Sol-Mars L1.
imageDescription: Mars with artificial magnetic field lines, Dr. James Green's proposal to prevent atmospheric erosion.

name: Nuclear-Electric Airship
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Unexplored Atmospheric Site & a different unexplored Atmospheric Site.
imageDescription: Solar-powered flying wing aircraft above clouds, reconnaissance airplane using advanced Stirling radioisotope generator.

name: Aerover Blimp Explorer
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Unexplored Atmospheric Site.
imageDescription: Multiple reconnaissance blimps descending through Mars atmosphere, powered by microwaves from mothership.

name: Solar Nebula Mafics
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Shielded. Destination: Phoebe.
imageDescription: Four thermal maps of Phoebe moon showing compositional diversity second only to Earth.

name: Mosquito
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Insight. Destination: Unexplored Size 2+ S Site.
imageDescription: Lander with drill strings on Mars surface, superdeep drills exploring world interiors for water and volatiles.

name: Planetary Rail Network
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Your Colony connected by buggy road to any Colony.
imageDescription: Solar or nuclear powered light rail on lunar surface, useful for surface transport and accelerating payloads.

name: Planetary Protection
ability: When Fulfilling: Bust the destination Site & place up to 2 delegates in any 1 Ideology. Destination: Unexplored Signposted (4A7d) Site.
imageDescription: Aerial view of colorful Mars crater, representing COSPAR recommendations to protect worlds from biological contamination.

name: Subnubilar Zeppelin
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Any player's Colony at an Atmospheric Site not in Mars zone.
imageDescription: Zeppelin airship above clouds, aerostat exploration observing surface directly and diving to supercritical ocean.

name: Bio-Inspired Rover
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Unexplored Astrobiology Site.
imageDescription: Ingenuity-style helicopter drone on Mars surface, solar-powered rovers exploring at fraction of rocket probe energy.

name: Spaceborn Political Rally
ability: When Fulfilling: Exomigrate to isobank; Discard a different Colonist. Destination: Isobank with a spaceborn or Promoted Colonist.
imageDescription: Robonaut and astronaut face to face, representing political rally against discrimination of spaceborn humans.

name: Junket
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: 2 different BEO Colonies (any Players') & Return.
imageDescription: Astronaut in space station looking at Earth, representing a grandstanding politician touring space colonies.

name: Chipjack
ability: Fulfilled Ability: You may perform implant Operations at your Colonies. When Fulfilling: 'Target' Colonist moves to LEO unless owner Discards 8 Aqua. Destination: Your Colonist Colocated with a 'target' augmented Colonist beyond Ceres zone.
imageDescription: Close-up of medical implant procedure, representing highly augmented supermen as targets for jealous competitors.

name: Drug Smuggling
ability: When Fulfilling: Owner of destination Colony Discards 4 Aquas or the Colony. Destination: Any player's BEO Colony.
imageDescription: Petri dish with biological cultures, representing contraband drugs and alcohol valued in lonely space reaches.

name: Trojan Listening Posts
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Agamemnon/Aeneas & Return.
imageDescription: Jupiter Trojan asteroids in space, equipment at distant sites to monitor inner and outer Solar System.

name: Cancer Research Mission
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Shielded. Destination: Comet Phaethon & Return (Season Yellow).
imageDescription: Microscopic view of cells, rare isotopes for radiotherapy using triggered decay to target cancer cells precisely.

name: Mercury Sunset Convoy
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Any player's Mercury Colony with augmented Colonist and Operational buggy robonaut.
imageDescription: Mercury's cratered surface map, where slow rotation allows driving along the surface to maintain permanent sunset.

name: Rescue Team
ability: Fulfilled Ability: You are allowed Murder/Suicide. Destination: Human Crew/Colonist at Site beyond Mars zone or Size 9+.
imageDescription: Astronaut in space station medical bay, representing extreme cost of high delta-v rescue missions.

name: Refueling Trawler
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Aqua gained. Air-eater refueling is a 1/Turn free action. Destination: Aerobrake Space beyond Jupiter zone.
imageDescription: Spacecraft cockpit view above gas giant clouds, trawling collector system to scoop gases from thermosphere.

name: SWIV Miner
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Unexplored Size 2+ zero Hydration Site & Return.
imageDescription: Mining facility with tanks and conveyor on planetary surface, robonautic trucks collecting solar wind implanted isotopes.

name: Skyhook
ability: When Fulfilling: Build a Space Elevator at this Site (no Hazard Roll). Destination: Your Factory Site at one end of a Space Elevator icon.
imageDescription: Earth with rotating tether system and spacecraft, skyhook boosting payloads via momentum transfer.

name: Tsiolkovsky Elevator Lab
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Your factory-assist landings/liftoffs at Elevator Sites treat lander burns as normal Burn Spaces. Destination: Unexplored Size 2+ Space Elevator Site, then liftoff from that Site.
imageDescription: Space elevator extending from Earth into orbit, experimentation to understand practical forces and materials.

name: Ring Rain
ability: Fulfilled Ability: 'ring'. Destination: Rhea.
imageDescription: Saturn with visible ring system and electromagnetic erosion causing rain of ice from the rings.

name: Spin Control
ability: Fulfilled Ability: 'spin'. Destination: Hazard Space adjacent to Comet Phaethon (Season Yellow).
imageDescription: Tumbling asteroid or comet rotating on three axes, extremely challenging for human navigation and landing.

name: Sunrise Project
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Shielded. Destination: Unexplored Atmospheric Site beyond Jupiter zone & Return.
imageDescription: Dim alien sunset/sunrise on distant world, capturing pristine sunrises on alien planets before industrialization.

name: Search for Life Center
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Echeclus & Return.
imageDescription: Colorful alien landscape with geothermal features, studying chirality of organic molecules to detect carbon-based life.

name: Deep Space One
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Sycorax.
imageDescription: Uranus, the easiest source for bulk quantities of clean fusion fuel Helium-3 in high demand on Earth.

name: Yarkovsky Research
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Davida.
imageDescription: Large asteroid Davida, studying the YORP effect that changes asteroid rotation from solar scattering and thermal emission.

name: Classified Security Payload
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Comet Crommelin (Season Yellow).
imageDescription: Interior of spacecraft cargo bay with redacted/classified text, representing secret military payload.

name: Hardened Base
ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Cruithne.
imageDescription: Buried bunker installation on asteroid surface, hardened against threats at abandoned prospecting sites.
